backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing access-controlled user profiles, direct messages, and group chat creation with message storage and permission checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related source files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of frontend file summaries describing each component’s purpose in the app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and OKLCH Material Design theme variables for light and dark mode.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the root React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app router handling authentication, profile flow, and rendering chat layout via TanStack Router.
frontend/src/components/chat/AddParticip: Dialog for adding a participant to a group chat using a Principal ID with error handling and mutation calls.
frontend/src/components/chat/Conversatio: Sidebar listing conversations with controls for refreshing, creating DMs or groups, and selecting chats.
frontend/src/components/chat/CreateGroup: Dialog component for creating a new group chat, handling name input, mutation, validation, and success/error feedback.
frontend/src/components/chat/NewDmDialog: Dialog for starting a direct message by entering a Principal ID, validating it, and creating a DM conversation object.
Displays a conversation thread for DMs or groups, fetching and sending messages, handling refresh, and supporting participant addition.
frontend/src/components/material/AppShel: Layout component providing the app bar, user profile display, logout handling, and container for main content.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor using the user’s identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, logout, stored identities, and related status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for user profiles, direct messages, and group chat operations using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind layers and defines light/dark Material-style color variables, base styles, and custom elevation shadows.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/ChatHomePage.tsx: Implements the main chat layout with a conversation list, thread view, and responsive mobile behavior.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Renders the Internet Identity login screen with Material-style theming and a sign-in button.
frontend/src/pages/RegisterPage.tsx: Provides a user registration form to create a profile using username and display name.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters via query strings or hashes.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom Material-style colors, shadows, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, requirements, features, and asset guidelines for the messaging app.
